nodes.text: Mak Pra was Human male individual active during the Clone Wars, who operated on the planet Felucia as the Galactic Republic's contact, while living amongst the native Jungle Felucian species. When Jedi Master Mavra Zane and her Padawans arrived on the planet, having escaped Trandoshan custody, Pra coordinated with them his plan of an attack on the Commerce Guild Presidente Shu Mai's headquarters. Along with the Jedi and the Jungle Felucians, Pra participated in the ensuing battle.
Mak Pra was created for the video game Kinect Star Wars, and is voiced by Nolan North.
